title: Central Bank bond issue: Perpetual Treasuries makes profit of Rs.14,845 Million: JVP
content: Testifying before the Presidential Commission on on the Central Bank bond issue, JVP provincial councilor Wasantha Samarasinghe said yesterday Perpetual Treasuries (PT) had made a profit of Rs.14,845 million on the sale of bonds from February 27, 2015 to May 26, 2016.
